## FieldAngle class

Class for an editable angle field.  Blockly.FieldAngle

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FieldAngle extends FieldTextInput 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [FieldTextInput](./blockly.fieldtextinput.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(opt\_value, opt\_validator, opt\_config)](./blockly.fieldangle._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>FieldAngle</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [CLOCKWISE](./blockly.fieldangle.clockwise.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) | Default property describing which direction makes an angle field's value increase. Angle increases clockwise (true) or counterclockwise (false). |
|  [gauge\_](./blockly.fieldangle.gauge_.md) |  | SVGElement \| null | The angle picker's gauge path depending on the value. |
|  [HALF](./blockly.fieldangle.half.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Half the width of protractor image. |
|  [line\_](./blockly.fieldangle.line_.md) |  | SVGElement \| null | The angle picker's line drawn representing the value's angle. |
|  [OFFSET](./blockly.fieldangle.offset.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) | The default offset of 0 degrees (and all angles). Always offsets in the counterclockwise direction, regardless of the field's clockwise property. Usually either 0 (0 = right) or 90 (0 = up). |
|  [RADIUS](./blockly.fieldangle.radius.md) | <code>static</code> | number | Radius of protractor circle. Slightly smaller than protractor size since otherwise SVG crops off half the border at the edges. |
|  [ROUND](./blockly.fieldangle.round.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) | The default amount to round angles to when using a mouse or keyboard nav input. Must be a positive integer to support keyboard navigation. |
|  [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fieldangle.serializable.md) |  | boolean | Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable. |
|  [symbol\_](./blockly.fieldangle.symbol_.md) |  | SVGTSpanElement | The degree symbol for this field. |
|  [WRAP](./blockly.fieldangle.wrap.md) | <code>static</code> | (not declared) | The default maximum angle to allow before wrapping. Usually either 360 (for 0 to 359.9) or 180 (for -179.9 to 180). |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [configure\_(config)](./blockly.fieldangle.configure_.md) |  | Configure the field based on the given map of options. |
|  [doClassValidation\_(opt\_newValue)](./blockly.fieldangle.doclassvalidation_.md) |  | Ensure that the input value is a valid angle. |

|  [onMouseMove\_(e)](./blockly.fieldangle.onmousemove_.md) |  | Set the angle to match the mouse's position. |
|  [render\_()](./blockly.fieldangle.render_.md) |  | Updates the graph when the field rerenders. |
|  [showEditor\_(opt\_e)](./blockly.fieldangle.showeditor_.md) |  | Create and show the angle field's editor. |
